name: Battle-chat
body:
Battle Chat ============= Battle Chat is an unofficial Battlelog chat [application for Android devices running 2.2+ and onward] (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ninetwozero.battlechat). About the author ------------ **Karl Lindmark**
E-mail: support@ninetwozero.com
Web: http://www.ninetwozero.com
Twitter: [@karllindmark](https://www.twitter.com/karllindmark)
Contributors ------------ **Peter Budo** (Maven & CI testing setup)
E-mail: peter.budo@gmail.com
Twitter: [@peter_budo](https://www.twitter.com/peter-budo)
**Daniel Peukert** (Czech translation)
Twitter: [@dapil](https://www.twitter.com/dapil)
Web: http://gplus.to/dpeukert
**Steve Beaudet** (Logo)
Twitter: [@dbagjones](https://www.twitter.com/dbagjones)
Web: http://djonesradio.com
### Special thanks To all the people that have helped out by testing, providing feedback and/or anything else helpful. Much appreciated. :-)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
